title: Smart Weather
rainySeasonTip: Order 30 minutes earlier to avoid rain delays
hotWeatherTip: Cold drinks and fresh food will be prioritized
stormyWeatherTip: Monitor weather alerts, service may be suspended
promoCondition: Valid for orders from {{amount}} and above
selectWeatherPrompt: Select current weather conditions for accurate delivery predictions

description.sunny: Perfect weather, ideal delivery conditions with smooth road access
description.cloudy: Stable weather, normal delivery operations unaffected
description.rain: Light rain may cause delays due to traffic and careful driving
description.heavyRain: Heavy rain significantly affects traffic, increasing delivery time
description.storm: Dangerous weather, delivery service suspended for safety
description.flood: Severe flooding, unable to deliver in affected areas

alert.rain: Note: Delivery time may be extended due to rain
alert.heavyRain: Warning: Heavy rain may cause serious delays
alert.storm: Danger: Delivery suspended due to storm
alert.flood: Emergency: Service unavailable due to flooding

sunny.orderEarly: Order early to avoid peak hours
sunny.coldItems: Great time to order cold drinks

rain.orderEarly: Order 30 minutes early to account for delays

heavyRain.significantDelay: May be significantly delayed, please be patient
heavyRain.considerPostponing: Consider postponing order if not urgent

flood.suspended: Unable to deliver in flooded areas

cardAccessibilityHint: Tap to select this weather condition
